# Alex Khaerov â€” Personal Website

> Technology leader building cloud platforms, developer infrastructure, and engineering teams at scale.

Alex Khaerov is Director of Cloud Foundation at Prudential in Singapore with 15+ years of experience in cloud infrastructure, platform engineering, and AI-driven automation. He holds 3 US patents in cloud integration, an MBA from Quantic School of Business and Technology, and is an active open-source contributor and international conference speaker.

## Site Structure

- [Home](https://hayorov.me/): Overview and recent blog posts
- [About Me](https://hayorov.me/about/): Professional background, resume, speaking engagements, and personal interests
- [Blog Posts](https://hayorov.me/posts/): Technical articles on cloud infrastructure, platform engineering, DevOps, and AI
- [My Talks](https://hayorov.me/talks/): Conference presentations at HashiDays, Cloud Expo Asia, DevOps Summit, FOSSASIA, and more
- [Publications](https://hayorov.me/publications/): Technical publications on Medium, Habr, and academic works
- [FPV & UAV](https://hayorov.me/fpv/): FPV drone building hobby
- [Cycling](https://hayorov.me/cycling/): Road cycling in Singapore

## Key Topics

- Cloud Infrastructure & Platform Engineering
- Kubernetes & Cloud-Native Architecture
- Internal Developer Platforms (IDPs)
- AI-Driven Automation & GenAI
- DevOps & Engineering Leadership
- Terraform & Infrastructure as Code
- Multi-cloud Architecture
